content:
Hello,

I've trying to find out if FHIR Subscriptions are supported by Azure FHIR API and how this is done but I could not find anything. I found a blog here https://cloudblogs.microsoft.com/opensource/2020/01/07/fhir-subscriptions-state-changes/ from 2020 but nothing else.

Is there any documentation about this? Is it supported already?

Thanks
@Brendan Kowitz @Caitlin Voegele
It isn't yet. We'll likely schedule this feature after R4B is available, but I don't have an ETA
